availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Euphany "Fannie" Roberts. Father of Elizabeth Roberts, Wiley Roberts, Susana Roberts, Sarah E. Roberts, William Roberts, Rosa Carlina Roberts, Isaac Roberts, Lucinda Roberts, James Roberts, Mitchell Roberts, and Joyce I. Roberts. Laborer in Grayson County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Grayson County, District 19, p. 200A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 98.
